name: Bezique (itch)
description:
Intellectual card game "Bezique", designed for two players.
Having played 20 rounds with a good score, the player enters the local table of champions.
In addition, it is possible to send an account to the game server, so that all fans of this game around the world can compete with each other.
The program allows you to choose a deck of cards, shirts, background of the playing table and much more to your taste.
There is a built-in Internet radio for 80 radio stations.
Unobtrusive music and sound.
To use all the features of the game, additional dlls may be required, which can be found on the developer's website.
Supported languages: English + Russian + German.
